body:
last night i drank a lot of caffeine. it is now 5:41am and i havent slept. the birds just started chriping and i am full of regret yet i have no intention of sleeping
has anyone else ever had an uh oh experience like this? make me feel better by sharing below

(btw... all those ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) posts from me were the result of both sleep deprievation and caffeination. sorry)

title: "Birds Chirping"

replies.body:
This what you are experiencing is my normal holyday-sleep-rhythm.
I'm awake from 10 or 11pm to 8 or 9 am. then sleeping. 
It's really annoying, cuz my parents always want to do something with me, but I'm soooo tired.

replies.body:
That's happened to me like a hundred times. 

Goes to bed at 12 
(Watches Netflix till 4) :/

replies.body: It was about 1 am and i was like "one more game wont hurt. Said that again after that game was over. Again... and again and again and again and again (you get the point). I saw the sunrise in the distance and was like "oh crap!"... Not to mention, but it was also a school night...
